== Kallambella (610492) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kallambella is a village in the [[Sira ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 1757.8 hectares and harbouring 1225 households with total population of 4833 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Sira]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 2438 and female population is 2395. Scheduled Caste Population is 1175 and Scheduled Tribes population is 268. Census Location Code of the village is 610492<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
